instruction: [INST] Analyze this file to learn MacBook motherboard repair. The 'definitions' section explains key technical terms. The 'threads' section contains real-world repair discussions. Use both sections to understand and learn how to troubleshoot MacBook issues. Posts from username 'larossmann' , 'dukefawks' , and '2informaticos' are posts from trusted experts.[/INST]

definitions.820-3476: What is 820-3476? a LOGIC BOARD PART NUMBER.

threads.title: <LOGIC BOARD PART NUMBER>820-3476</LOGIC BOARD PART NUMBER> - Black screen with backlight on after apple logo and loading screen
threads.message:
<LOGIC BOARD PART NUMBER>820-3476</LOGIC BOARD PART NUMBER> - board turns on, and it shows image, when i run from ssd it shows apple logo, it loads and then right when it suppose to switch from apple logo and black screen, it just stays black screen with the backlight,

any idea what i should look for

threads.title: <LOGIC BOARD PART NUMBER>820-3476</LOGIC BOARD PART NUMBER> - Black screen with backlight on after apple logo and loading screen
threads.message: Try PRAM reset/SMC reset? Tried a known good SSD?

threads.title: <LOGIC BOARD PART NUMBER>820-3476</LOGIC BOARD PART NUMBER> - Black screen with backlight on after apple logo and loading screen
<LOGIC BOARD PART NUMBER>820-3476</LOGIC BOARD PART NUMBER> - Black screen with backlight on after apple logo and loading screen
threads.message: Ew yeah not sure on this one. Are you able to run ASD 162? Any signs of corrosion?

threads.title: <LOGIC BOARD PART NUMBER>820-3476</LOGIC BOARD PART NUMBER> - Black screen with backlight on after apple logo and loading screen
threads.message:
Did you try to boot from USB OSX?
Use your test OSX...
Should be good to try new BIOS.
